description.value:
Requirements The companion's last action was a successful Performance check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Perform]{Perform}. The companion maintains its performance to captivate a single target within 30 feet that witnessed its successful performance. The target must attempt a Will save.

Success The target is unaffected and temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Fascinated]{Fascinated} by the companion for its next action and then is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Critical Failure The target is fascinated by the companion for 1 round. While it remains fascinated, it can't use reactions.

source.value: Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God
